alert.note: Alert for Custer; Lincoln; Logan; McPherson (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 13 at 7:11PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Lincoln, Logan, eastern McPherson, northwestern Custer, southwestern Blaine and southern Thomas Counties through 800 PM CDT... At 711 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Stapleton, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and possible blowing dust. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Stapleton, Arnold, Gandy, Ringgold, Logan, Highway 83 crossing The Dismal River, Linscott, Tarboz Lake, Shanklin Bluff, Pleasant Hill, Hoagland and Brown Lake. This includes the following highways... Highway 2 between mile markers 242 and 256. Highway 92 between mile markers 210 and 259. Highway 97 between mile markers 16 and 21. Highway 83 between mile markers 104 and 135. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
